description: A 50km trail race with combination of single track and fire roads. Some of the single track is quite technical.
directions: From Vancouver:Take Hastings heading East.Take Barnet Hwy toward Port MoodyTurn left at Barnet Hw/St Johns st.Turn left on Ioco RdAt Ungless Way, turn left onto Ioco RdTurn right at 1st AveSlight left at Bedwell Bay RdRight at White Pine Beach Rd(park at white pine beach)
title: Diez Vista 50k Race
